name: MTAB jailbreak
intro: Just like the BCKW system, it consists of four combinators,
representing duplication, swapping, discarding, and composition, respectively:
M a = a, T a b = b a, A a b = b,
and B a b c = a (b c).
Your task is to go back to BCKW from here. Good luck!

content.title: Identity, again
descr: Build I from M, T, A, and B.

content.title: Cardinal revisited
descr: Build C from M, T, A, and B.

content.title: Truth coming out of her well
descr: Build K from M, T, A, and B.

content.title: The last step
descr: Build W from M, T, A, and B.
